articles.description: Ricki Lake, 53, went as Tracy Turnblad for Halloween by wearing a big hair wig and the original Hairspray dress for first time since the film shoot in 1987.
articles.content:
Ricki Lake is taking a trip down memory lane.
On Friday, during a special Halloween edition of The View, Lake slipped back into her breakout role as Tracy Turnblad from Hairspray, by donning the act… [+4485 chars]
